en.name: This Is Me!
en.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by {{16//20//24//28//32%}}. Increases the DMG of the wearer when they use their Ultimate by {{60//75//90//105//120%}} of the wearer's DEF. This effect only applies 1 time per enemy target during each use of the wearer's Ultimate.

zh.name: 这就是我啦！
zh.description: 使装备者防御力提高{{16//20//24//28//32%}}。使装备者施放终结技时造成的伤害值提高，提高数值等同于装备者防御力的{{60//75//90//105//120%}}，该效果每次施放终结技时对每个敌方目标仅生效1次。
